ref: 14831 saṁnaṣṭa -- : H. sannāṭā (→ N. sannāṭo) m. ʻ desolate silence, fearstrickenness ʼ prob. same as san(n)āṭā m. ʻ loud whistling or whizzing noise ʼ s.v. saṁnādayati and conn. with san -- in the reduplicated formations sansanānā ʻ to whizz, whistle ʼ (s.v. svaná -- ) and sansanī f. ʻ silence, fearstrickenness ʼ with the same range of meaning (J. C. W.).
NIA. sameṭ -- < *sameṭh<-> with loss of aspiration due to preceding s.
